hero.title:
From <0/> to <1>Digital Entrepreneur:
Your Online Store in <2>Minutes
hero.subtitle: <0>Create</0>, <1>sell</1>, and <2>grow</2> your brand with our <3>all-in-one</3> platform. No commissions, no limits.
hero.image_alt: An artisan's workshop with various tools and creations.

features.title: Everything Your Business Needs to Sell Online
features.instant_creation_description: No designs? Describe an idea and our AI can generate products and merchandising for your brand. Expand your catalog effortlessly.
features.no_commission_description: Unlike marketplaces, your store is 100% yours. You don't pay sales commissions, which means all profits stay in your pocket.
features.all_in_one_description: Manage inventory, process orders, and review your earnings from an intuitive dashboard. Less time managing, more time growing your business.

how_it_works.title: Your Launch in 3 Simple Steps
how_it_works.step1_description: Sign up in minutes, upload your logo, and choose your brand colors. Your online store will take shape instantly, no designer needed.
how_it_works.step2_description: Add your products with photos, descriptions, and prices. Our platform is flexible so you can sell any type of item, from physical to digital products.
how_it_works.step3_description: Activate your store with a single click and start accepting payments securely. You're ready to welcome your first customers and manage your orders easily.
how_it_works.image_alt: Display of handmade products in a store

pricing.title: Simple and Transparent Plans
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your growth. No hidden fees. Ever.

testimonials.title: Powering Businesses Like Yours
testimonials.subtitle: From small merchants to growing brands, our platform is the engine for new success stories.

contact.title: Contact Sales
contact.subtitle: Have special requirements? Our team is ready to help you create a custom plan.

cta.title: Ready to Sell Online and Grow Your Business?
cta.subtitle: Thousands of small businesses already sell online. Don't get left behind.

footer.created_with_love: Created with love for entrepreneurs by
